User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://yourdomain.com/sitemap.xml

# Allow crawling of all content
Allow: /blog/
Allow: /services/
Allow: /areas/
Allow: /about/
Allow: /contact/
Allow: /troubleshooting/
Allow: /faq/

# Prevent crawling of unnecessary files
Disallow: /assets/
Disallow: /*.js$
Disallow: /*.css$
